name: DevOrion Related Post
author: Selman Demirdoven

sections.description: DevOrion Related Post plugin gives administrators or editors the ability to attach inline related post to the editing post and display it on frontend.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘devorion-related-post’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Press Add New button in order to create a post
  4. You will see the related post metabox on the right sidebar
  5. Set the options and save the post

DevOrion Related Post requires php 5.2 or higher.
sections.faq:
I’m having issues getting the plugin to work what should I do?

Contact with us by using the form on Contact Page

Where can I get more information and support for this plugin?

Visit the Features Page at devorion.work
sections.changelog: Visit the Features Page at devorion.work
